meanings.definition: The layer of material inside a shoe that provides cushioning and support for the foot.
meanings.sent1: My new sneakers have soft innersoles that make walking comfortable.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to replace your innersoles regularly to maintain foot health.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally put my innersoles in the washing machine, and now they're super clean!
meanings.sent4: The innersoles of the shoes were like clouds under my feet, making me feel like I was walking on air.
meanings.sent5: The innersoles molded perfectly to my feet, giving me the support I needed.
